rukus.text: 48|1|Wo que yi shangci ni yi zhong mingxian de shengli,
48|2|yibian an la she you ni yiwang de he jianglai de guoshi, bing wancheng ta dui ni de endian, qie zhaoshi ni yitiao zhenglu.
48|3|An la jiang gei ni yi zhong you li de yuanzhu.
48|4|Ta ceng jiang zhenjing jiang zai xinshimen de xinzhong, yibian tamen xinnian shang jia xinnian—tiandi de jundui, zhishi an la de, an la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de—
48|5|yibian ta shi xinshi hexin numen ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, er yong ju qizhong, bing she you tamen de zui'e. Ju an la kan lai, zhe shi weida de chenggong.

48|6|Yibian ta chengfa wei xin de nanren he nuren, he yi wu pei zhu de nanren he nuren, jiushi dui an la zuo eyi caixiang de ren, eyun zhi jianglin tamen, an la qian nu tamen qi jue tamen, bing wei tamen yubeile huo yu. Na guisu zhen elie!
48|7|Tiandi de jundui, zhishi an la de. An la shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.
48|8|Wo que yi paiqian ni zuo jianzheng, zuo baoxi zhe, zuo jinggao zhe,
48|9|yibian nimen gui xin'an la he shizhe, bing xiezhu ta, zunjing ta, zhaoxi zansong ta.

48|10|Yu ni ding yue de renmen, qishi shi yu an la ding yue; an la de shou shi zai tamen de shou zhi shang de. Beiyue zhe, zi shou beiyue zhi hai; shijian yu an la suo ding yue zhe, an la jiang shangci ta zhongda de baochou.
